<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_icir_vcm_vendor_contract_management</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Mandatory Attachment Check On VCM Portal</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	if(!current.hasAttachments())		
	{	
		gs.addErrorMessage('Please Attach an Attachment');		
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	
		action.setRedirectURL(current);		
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Nehal.Ranpise@infocenter.io</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-24 11:29:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4e9d58b4dbf82300ccd6f2f5ab961962</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Mandatory Attachment Check On VCM Portal</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Vendor Contract Management" source="x_icir_vcm">3fe81872db2caf40c203a2364b9619e0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Vendor Contract Management">3fe81872db2caf40c203a2364b9619e0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4e9d58b4dbf82300ccd6f2f5ab961962</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Nehal.Ranpise@infocenter.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-24 11:34:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4e9d58b4dbf82300ccd6f2f5ab961962"/></record_update>
